AdditionalKeySet.description: The attributes used to configure an OAuth/OpenID Connect additional signing key set with virtual issuers.

description.description: A description of the key set.

id.description: The unique ID for the key set. It can be any combination of [a-zA-Z0-9._-]. This property is system-assigned if not specified.

issuers.description: A list of virtual issuers that will use the current key set. Once assigned to a key set, the same virtual issuer cannot be assigned to another key set instance.

signingKeys.description: A set of references to the keys.

AdditionalKeySets.description: A collection of OAuth/OpenID Connect additional signing key sets.

items.description: The actual list of signing key sets.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.

OAuthOidcKeysSettings.description: Setting for OAuth/OpenID Connect signing and decryption key settings.

p256ActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-256 key currently active.

p256DecryptionActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-256 decryption key currently active.

p256DecryptionPreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-256 decryption key previously active.

p256DecryptionPublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-256 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p256PreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-256 key previously active.

p256PublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-256 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p384ActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-384 key currently active.

p384DecryptionActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-384 decryption key currently active.

p384DecryptionPreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-384 decryption key previously active.

p384DecryptionPublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-384 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p384PreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-384 key previously active.

p384PublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-384 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p521ActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-521 key currently active.

p521DecryptionActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-521 decryption key currently active.

p521DecryptionPreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-521 decryption key previously active.

p521DecryptionPublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-521 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p521PreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-521 key previously active.

p521PublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-521 certificate chain associated with the active key.

rsaActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the RSA key currently active.

rsaDecryptionActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the RSA decryption key currently active.

rsaDecryptionPreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the RSA decryption key previously active.

rsaDecryptionPublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the RSA certificate chain associated with the active key.

rsaPreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the RSA key previously active.

rsaPublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the RSA certificate chain associated with the active key.

location.description: A read-only URL that references the resource. If the resource is not currently URL-accessible, this property will be null.

SigningKeys.description: Setting for a OAuth/OpenID Connect signing key set while using multiple virtual issuers.

p256ActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-256 key currently active.

p256PreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-256 key previously active.

p256PublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-256 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p384ActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-384 key currently active.

p384PreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-384 key previously active.

p384PublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-384 certificate chain associated with the active key.

p521ActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the P-521 key currently active.

p521PreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the P-521 key previously active.

p521PublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the P-521 certificate chain associated with the active key.

rsaActiveCertRef.description: Reference to the RSA key currently active.

rsaPreviousCertRef.description: Reference to the RSA key previously active.

rsaPublishX5cParameter.description: Enable publishing of the RSA certificate chain associated with the active key.

fieldPath.description: The path to the model field to which the error relates, if one exists.
